MAP.NAME: specifyDefaultSetting
MAP.COMMENT: Set default setting Like dbAlias and autoMode

MAP.NAME: specifyConcProgSettings
MAP.COMMENT: Set default parameters required for running the Concurrent Program

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Main Logic Sequence - exit on failure

EXIT.COMMENT: Exit from the flow in case autoMode is set to False

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Error Handling Sequence - exit on done
